bibl.title: The Papyrus Collections in Emilia-Romagna (Italy).
bibl.note: The collection of the University Library (Biblioteca Universitaria) in Bologna. - The papyri in the Department of Ancient History. - The papyri in the Library of Archiginnasio. - The papyri in the Museo Civico. - The collection of "medieval"papyri in the Museo Arcivescovile of Ravenna. - The so-called Papyrus Garampi in the Biblioteca Civica Gambalunga in Rimini.
bibl.seg: GERACI Giovanni, The Papyrus Collections in Emilia-Romagna (Italy).
Willy CLARYSSE and Herbert VERRETH (Edd.), Papyrus Collections World Wide, 9-10 March 2000 (Brussels - Leuven) (Brussel, 2000) pp. 17-19.
